name: Capsule Facility Escape
description:
Use slow motion and guns to escape the facility that you are held captive in

Walk up to and click on the red guy to kill him and pick up his weapon

WHEN YOU DIE YOU COMPLETELY RESTART

To move you use W A D and to slide you use S

To use slow motion hold right click 

To shoot use left click

Hints:

Use the brown crates to block enemy bullets

Slide into enemies to kill them

slide under crates to throw them up

You can slide and jump off of walls

Music and art created by me!

You have to start fresh everytime you die.
